channel.title: open market on Mind the gap blog: Insights, ideas, and inspiration for the tech-savvy and curious.
channel.description: Recent content in open market on Mind the gap blog: Insights, ideas, and inspiration for the tech-savvy and curious.

item.title: All we do is invest.
item.description: All we are doing is investment. Taking the bus to meet a friend? That’s an investment. Quitting your job to work at another company? That’s investing. Skipping the gym? Bad investment, but still one. Going to bed early? Probably a good investment. So let me give you my best investment advice: spend your time wisely. Imagine you are a millionaire and you are placing your entire fortune into 24 chunks of money every day.

item.title: The Open Market series.
item.description: Welcome to the playground of my thoughts, a maze of ideas that’s been simmering in my mind, only now finding their way to the surface, and to you. This upcoming series of posts truly fits with the vision of the Mind the gap blog. We’ll be diving into a topic close to my heart, a complex puzzle made up of many pieces and deep reflections I’ve been nurturing for a while.
